column5: If ya seen some dippy painter swattin mosquitos last Friday as you were drivin thru Beachburg, On.  Twas I--Newspaper caught me paintin
Reporter probly thought you were flagging him down.LOL
Probably Bri
Holy Smokes !!!! I know a famous artist!!!
HA ha--yeah Mercman--that and 10 bucks will get ya a bag of senkos
And to think we knew you when you were just an ordinary guy.  Your name is Terrence?!  Congratualtions Bushart, always enjoy when you share your work with us.
Ha ha--No fear Mike---I'm still ordinary---at least that what the wife says
Ya I get the same thing when I go out in public.... o.k. maybe not the same thing but they do call the police to give me a ride home.....    Art
cool   :clapping:
I hear ya Art---just use your alias....."ART?---man that guy left hours ago  Thanks Motv8tr
Now that right there is some funny stuf!  Always nice to see people you know make it in the paper.  Cheers, Ron...
I don't get a ride home, I just get the tickets.
You got to ask them in that special way to get the ride.  Art
Thanks Ron and good luck on your mission with the town
This is how it turned out from the street painting stint  Your traditional landscape
Very nice Terrence. I like all your work.
very nice
Thanks guys
Great picture again Bushart! You really have found your style and niche.  I am still hacking away maybe in some decades i will find something. Call this one 'Evening: looking north'
Looks great EHG--always like a touch of red in the sky
